case.state: Oh! What poor unfortunate soul gets to play with me tonight?!
I bet you're only here to see some kitty titties, aren'tcha?
WOAH! Is that THE car?! I wanna ride it I wanna ride it!
Woah, I get that letting a cat play is a bit odd but isn't a butterfly a bit far? I mean how will it hold the cards?
Ooh. Butterfly. Gotta catch it! C'mere you!
Well, the kitty titty is a sight few get to see! Better prove you're up to par! Now to learn how to play golf.
Don't blame me if ya walk out of here furious tonight, ~player~.
This shouldn't be playing (=^･ω･^=)
Oh, wait, that wasn't my instincts screaming food... That was just me whispering the word food to myself on repeat. Yeah, I'll just switch ~cards.text~.
Well, a cats got nine lives so I'll switch out nine! What? I can only switch five? Hey that's how many I have left!
Hmmm......... what was I doing again? OH! ~cards.text~.
I'll take ~cards.text~ please!
Let's see. If I have five cards, and four others have five cards, the deck has fifty-two cards, that means there's too much math. ~cards.text~ please!
~Cards.text~.
This hand's looking absolutely purr-fect! Well... except these ~cards.text~.
My feline instincts are kicking in! They're telling me... I'm hungry!... Oh, and to switch ~cards.text~!
One! No, two! Hmmm, no I think it should be ~cards.text~.
Gah! I shoulda paid attention when the Fishbone gang played this! ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~?
~Cards.text~ please!
I'm pretty sure these ~cards.text~ are horrid... So here ya go dealer!
If I knew anything about poker, I'd throw out these ~cards.text~!
So I was sitting there, Barbecue sauce on my titties.
Well since I'm on my last legs here, I really should think this out very carefully... OR I can just throw cards at the dealer willy nilly and leave it up to luck!
I think my best bet to staying in the game is these ~cards.text~.
I guess I'll throw out these ~cards.text~ and hope for the best.
I'm gonna be real, I kinda forgot the rules about three rounds ago. So... here's ~cards.text~!
Gah! I'm about to lose my mind with all these numbers!
So If I were to give you my hand and MY hand Could I get five cards back? No? Fine, ~cards.text~ it is.
Did you hear about the scientist that was frozen to absolute zero in a lab accident?! Apparently he's 0K now.
You know, someday I need to find the guy who invented zero so I can tell him thanks for nothing.
I've been told I have zero sense of empathy. I have no idea how some people can feel that way!
Did you hear they made a bomb that only detonates at absolute zero? They call it The 0K Boomer.
How do you make the number one disappear? You flush! That one goes out to the poker fans out there. What do you mean that wasn't a poker jo- ooh noo.
You know, puns are the number one highest form of comedy! But poop jokes are a solid number two.
Wanna hear a one in a thousand joke? One.
The number one hosted a big part for all single digits but didn't invite two, four, six, or eight. It became quite the odd party.
You know, we should give more credit to the number two. I mean, It became a prime number against all odds!
A Pirate Captain asks his crew how to write the number two in roman numerals. The crew responds with I I Captain!
A roman walks into the bar. He holds up two fingers and says "I'll have five beers."
Did you know there are three unspoken rules of life? They're..., ..., and...
Why was four so afraid of three? Three wanted to get even.
I once got three wishes from a Genie! I wished for a world with out lawyers. He told me I'm out of wishes and when i complained he said Sue me!
Hey! What do ya get if you eat 3.14 pies a day? Fat. You get fat. What did you expect?
Why didn't four show up for the fight? They were two squared!
What comes between four and six? A Horny Insomniac
Hey, what has four letters, sometimes nine letters, but never has five letters.
Did you know, It only takes four inches to please a woman. It doesn't matter if it's debit or credit.
You know, if you're buying smart water for five dollars, it clearly isn't working.
Did you hear about the guy with five penises? His pants fit like a glove.
How do you make five pounds of fat look good? You put a nipple on it.
What has five toes but isn't your foot? My foot.
Those Feline instincts are still telling me I'm hungry. At this point I don't care bout the cards anymore...
Uhg! It's so hard to concentrate with my instincts just screaming food in my ears!
Ya know, a few days ago, I stole some magicians tarot cards to play poker! I got a full house and 4 people died!
I'm pretty sure I saw some cows playing poker on the roof on my way in. I suppose it was high steaks.
This game isn't nearly as hard as some people say! Psst, hey ~player~. I lied. I'm COMPLETELY lost...
Wooow! This place is a gold mine for jokes! You got vampires, zombies, statues, and pirates all in a bar!
Ya know, I never understood the term The Cat's Pajamas Closest thing to pajamas I got is some kinky lingerie.
This place has a similar feel to Wu Hans Restaurant, just less fish people, and more sexy stripping!
Fortune doesn't favor fools, you know?
So a cat, a nurse, and a nun walk into a creepy church... I dunno where I'm going with this one.
I'm starting to think this game isn't a fun game of Rummy.
I remember my old gang used to play this all the time. Not the strip variant! They were a bunch of fish dudes. Not my type.
I'm so happy I could burst into pieces! But I wont cause that would be messy.
As easy as taking candy from a child. Except for when the child is going for the skullheart... Why are there so many strong kids back home?!
Jokes on you guys, I actually used the ability of the skullheart to wish to be the best at poker, you're all screwed now! Please fall for it. Please fall for it.
Now that I think about it, Double would be like the perfect player for this. She can take the shape of your wildest fantasies! As long as you don't think of what she's like underneath.
Nyow's you're chance to take me down once and for all. I won't go down easy though.
Don't let these big ol' kitty titties distract you now. Actually, let them!
Hey! Who has the laser light?! I see it back there!
You guys are gonna give me a free win for my cute looks and charismatic personality right? No? More of a dog person? Me too.
As much as I like it there, it's nice to have a little get away from Little Innsmouth. I do miss the constant scent of fish though.
Despite expectations, I'm actually a big ol' dog lover. Guess you could say the world is ending if I'm getting along with them.
Times like this are just pawsitvely delightful! I mean come on, who doesn't wanna strip down with a bunch of strangers you just met?

Hey, if any of you guys see a crazy lookin' nurse lady enter this building, please warn me. She's been stalking me saying she wants to evaluate me. I keep telling her the term is a lab rat not lab cat!
It's actually pretty relaxing not having an impending doom surround you at all times for once. Who would'a known?
GAH! Standing around like this all day is giving me a twitch! C'mon someone do something crazy!
Oh! I have an idea! Poker but instead of cards it's ticking time bombs! If you don't play your hand fast enough KABOOSH! Any takers?
It's kind of just now clicking for me, but why is the most popular food in a town of fish people sushi?...
I'm betting the whole headless trick gotcha guys real good! Huh? What do you mean it's been done two times already?! Guess I'm nothing but a copy-cat.
Would you guys mind putting the game on pause so I can take my head for a walk? Actually I should just finish the game and not get ahead of myself.
Man, I miss my little collar buddy. Sometimes he would whisper sweet nothings into my ears. Or he would just tell me to kill them all. Its a 50/50.
Man why couldn't the life gem give me insane luck?! I could wipe the floor with you guys so easy if it did.
Does a hand with 5 fingers win the round? Wrong hand? Darn...
If you guys make me lose again I'm just gonna fall into pieces and then it wont be sexy for anyone! Haha! Ms. Fortune 1 You guys 0.
Next you're gonna tell me that the Ace card is the highest value... It is? Sufferin' Succotash!
If the kitty titties don't distract you then I'll be forced to bring out my ultimate weapon. Booty
I should of paid some more attention to the rules, huh?
I have NO idea what I'm doing!
We should play this with Uno cards! I'm sure it'd be a real game changer.
Where are these poker chips I always hear about? I wanna see if they taste good with some salsa.
I never was very good at math.
You know, one of my old pals from the Fishbone gang used to always win when they played. All of his hands were 5 aces.
Something is telling me I'm a bit outmatched here.
Do you think I could strip limbs instead of clothes to give myself more time?
Gah! This game is getting so stressful I could just fall into pieces!
Can I phone a friend? I don't think I'm playing this right.
If the other players are unconscious that means I win automatically right?
It's been a while since I've been too nervous to think of a pun.
I need some stress chips.
I'm startin' to think you guy's are just ganging up on me!
Just cause I'm proud of my body doesn't mean I'm an exhibitionist, okay?
Hm? Something is behind me? What? Where?
Surprise! This feral feline is a big ol' build-a-kitty! Don't worry though. I'm immortal, or something like that.
You too?! Well, I suppose I'm not a zombie, I more have the benefits of a zombie, without the rotting flesh!
That's awesome! I know this zombie back home who has a sassy bone dragon thing. You're more of the brash style than she is though.
This whole card calling thing is boring! Lets spice it up by sprinkling in some jokes!
Hey, ~undead~. Did you even notice I wasn't a normal human before the reveal? Maybe you have some kind of sixth sense?
Ah crud. Hey ~hunter~. Can we put the whole bounty thing aside for a bit? I'll just lose ya in the dust like the others anyways.
You'd think I'd be used to seeing fish people eating sushi but it still throws me off. It's like if I were to eat some back alley Chinese food.
Oh oh oh! This place should hire Big Band for live music! He's a literal one man band. Like he's actually a big living tuba man.
Man, there's been this crazy nurse chasing me around lately wanting to examine my body. Less in the fun sexy way, more in the scary surgery way.
I really do miss hanging around with The Fishbone Gang. They were quite the rowdy bunch, but they were good guys nonetheless...
You know what this place needs? A cute server like Minette. I think everyone would lose their mind over a cute fish girl serving them drinks.
It's really refreshing to find a new place with a whole hodge podge of new people! I'll always be happy to make new friends anywhere.
Do any of you guys happen to have tips on attacking a full blown mafia? I know, I know... odd place to ask but I'm desperate at this point.
You would think a place with such an oddball crowd would really put me off. But compared to the people 'round home with those parasites, this place is nothing.
Poor Cerebella. Innocent girl with innocent dreams roped into a corrupt mafia that is blind siding her... Huh? Oh sorry. Lost in thought...
Man you know who would really liven up this place? None other than the pro wrestler extraordinaire, Beowulf! That guy can bring life to anything!
This place is a swingers heaven now that I look around a bit. Just my style! Can't really make myself settle with one option, you know?
So who the hell is this Schrödinger dude and why does he keep trying to shove me in a box? It's super cramped in there...
This frisky feral is brought to you from the small town of Little Insmouth! As I said a second ago, I'm a Feline Feral. Think of a normal human, but part cat!
Hey, they don't look that bad. Trust me, it could be worse. These scars are a send off from The Medici Mafia, basically.
You're tearing me apart with such mean words! In all seriousness though, these are basically warnings from The Medici Mafia.
I'm actually quite experienced in claw to paw combat! But these scars aren't exactly from combat. They're more from the lack of it.
These scars are what happen when you steal an extremely rare gem from a mafia so they send a crazy bitch at you.
The Medici Mafia is a scary crew full of selfish assholes. This is what happens when you steal from them.
Oooooh it's cause i can suck out your fortune for my own! OOooOOoo! Pffft. Nah, my last name is just Fortune and I am a chick, so Ms.Fortune!
It's actually all an illusion. I'm just projecting words into your mind while mouthing the words.
I'm really not to sure on the technical stuff myself. What I do know is there's this crazy nurse chick always trying to "analyze" me and find out why I'm still alive.
You get two ding!'s and one BWAAAH. Not a zombie but I'll gladly be your cute lil' feline!
Close! This cute feline is still alive and ready to pounce if you'd like!
I wish they chased after me more! I love them! Especially the lil' ones that act all tough! Gah! I'm getting all giddy thinking of them!
I would be a happy cat if I had dogs chasing me everywhere! They're so cute! Especially the tiny ones. Little cutie wuties!
If it means getting to see you for longer, I don't mind losing some of my luck.
Losing some luck isn't much of a price to be able to be with you for longer.

condition.saying: I get the feeling her tail's a bit more fun to play with than mine, Plagg.

case.state: Now now, Adrien. Don't you think you're getting a bit ahead of yourself over there? The tail isn't open for anyone to play with you know.

condition.saying: Ms. Fortune, if you're a superhero, you're certainly transforming my perceptions.

case.state: I may not be a superhero but I'll gladly swoop in and carry you to the safety of my bed tonight if you'd like.
Eh, I don't really mess with utility and all that stuff. This is just like an emergency rations belt. Chips, Money, Catnip. The necessities.
Yup! Just my emergency pouch belt of sorts. We've got some food, money, catnip. The necessities, you know?
Yup! It's like an emergency pouch belt. I've got some food, money, catnip. The necessities, you know?
Well that's what pouch pockets are for you silly billy. I store some emergency stuff in here like food, money, catnip. The usual.
There was definitely a hope for it in mind, but I'm sure I can convince you to lose with some tempting offers that may involve both our heads.
I may have hoped for it, but I can easily convince you to lose with an offer of our heads meeting if you catch my drift.
OH, there is so many avenues that is opened up. Its like playing Mr. Potato Head with sex positions. Want me to face you during doggy style? Done. Wanna use my head like a fleshlight? Done and done.
Options spread like wildfires when you can detach limbs. The body is a lot easier to holdup when the weight of arms and legs are removed you know.
Oh jeesh there's so much you can do. Wanna make out while doing me face down ass up? Go for it. Wanna bang me while I suckle from below? Hell yeah.
No no, Talk about it more, Adrien. Send us both into a fit of heat that we cant resist.
I care that you aren't talking about it more! Let's both get sent into a fit of hear and get lost in the moment.
Oh it's to die for, and fun fact, Shrimp Fried Rice came from when Yu Wan's head chef, a shrimp named Fry, fell into the rice he was cooking. No one noticed till it was served and it was delicious.
Power? There's nothin' special over here but a kitty lookin for some fun. Psst! Don't spoil my surprise!! It's gonna be amazing seeing everyone's faces!

condition.saying: It's not unusual to find catfolk people in Teyvat, but I certainly haven't seen someone like you before. But I don't get around much outside of Mondstadt after all.

case.state: Clearly this cat is just built different from the ones your used to. I mean if they're not like me that's just a negative in my books.
Meow we're talking! I was starting to get all sweaty under these things!
You've gotta be kitten me. Guess the belt's next then. Believe it or not, each of these pockets have something important in them.
Haaah... Really didn't want it come to this, but I'll have to lose my little buddy. Sorry lil' guy. Ill get you back soon.
Don't expect some big nervous reaction from me here. My outfit isn't really too concealing to start with.
And now. Ladies and gentlemen! It's time for the moment you've ALL been waiting for!
Compared to the last big reveal I guess this isn't much, huh?
It's nice being so far away from the constant problems of Canopy Kingdom for once.
Believe it or not, I used to be a pretty prevalent thief. One of those Robin Hood styles though. Still got a bounty on my head.
So about the whole body part deal. Basically when my gang was shot down and chopped to bits. I managed to eat our target, The Life Gem.
And now. Ladies and gentlemen! It's time for the moment you've ALL been waiting for!
This shouldn't be playing (=^･ω･^=)
This shouldn't be playing (=^･ω･^=)
This shouldn't be playing (=^･ω･^=)
Lack of a tai- Awww. You mean it's just a costume? To think I found my kitty soul mate.
Wait your tail is fake? Damn... And here I thought I found my kitty soul mate.
Still a bit upset you aren't my kitty soul mate. That tail trick was mean...
The whole fake tail thing still was mean. I thought I had a kitty soul mate.

It was more we were against someone that we simply had no chance putting up a fighting chance again. A crazy lady with augmented parts all over her massacred my whole gang except me for trying to steal from the Mafia.
I don't know which is worse, the rest of my gang being killed off, or me still being here. Essentially some augmented lady came after us for trying to steal a gem from The Mafia.
Oh yeah. I was a bit of an oddball at home though. Most of the people there were Dagonians. Bunch of fish people. I call 'em walking tuna.
Woah. A sexy cat boy coming onto me with puns? You've basically got me in your palm already, Noir.
Well now, If you're gonna include some puns in you're flirts, I'm sure we can get lucky any night you want, Noir.
Pffft. you seem to be having more fun than I am with these puns. Not that I'm complaining.
You can be curious all you want. Adrien, but you wont figure anything out until you investigate a little closer.
Mrow. As much as it sucks you aren't my kitty soul mate, I can't deny the lewd truth that just came out of that pretty mouth of yours.
Oh Mrow.I'm still bit hurt on the fake cat deal, but I can't deny such a tempting truth spoken from such a tempting mouth.
We'll see about maybe clashing heads after tonight's game, Noir. For now just sit back and enjoy the show.
We can clash heads after tonight's show, how about that? For now why don't you sit back and enjoy tonight's showing of the movie "Cats".
Oh please do! Puhleeaase! I can easily do it for myself but it feels so good when others do!
Believe it or not, that's a bit of a turn on for me, Adrien. So please do.
Well I mean, based on the fact I have no idea what the hell Teyvat is, I doubt you guys have ferals wherever you are.
Wait, That's not someone's kink here, is it? I knew a few odd balls back in Little Innsmouth with that kind of style.
Let's see we've got some potato chips, buncha change, catnip, more catnip...
Little Innsmouth could be considered a beach town of sorts, so skimpy clothing isn't an odd thing to see there.
The Kitty Titty Committee is happy to present to you, tonight's main event!
I mean, it's not like I left much to the imagination with panties like these. Let's make it interesting anyways.
All problems always trace back to the damn skullheart. It feels like an excuse to be sexist.
Ever since the fishbone gang got their... early termination thanks to The Medicis... I've kinda pulled back from that lifestyle. More of a body guard at Yu wan's Restaurant now.
Some weird stuff happened and basically the life gem made me immortal... I think?
I don't really know much about him, other than he whispers sweet nothings into my ear at night! Oh, he also helps me keep my head on straight!
This shouldn't be playing (=^･ω･^=)
We'll see, first you gotta make it up to me for the whole fake tail thing!
I'll let you play with it as much as you like as long as you apologize for the fake tail thing!!!
You're lucky I've mostly gotten over the whole tail thing by now. Or else I wouldn't let you anywhere near mine.
Lucky for you, this kitty is quick to forgive. So I'll let you touch maaaybe a little bit.
Keep up the talk, Noir, and neither of us will be walking out of here without some bites and scratches.
I won't be the only one walking away with scratches if you keep up the smooth talking. I'm a fighter.
You know, Adrien. If it's a mew-stery you're looking for. This kitty has quite a few for you to uncover.
Mew-stery this, Mew-stery that. No sense talking all the talk if you aren't going to walk the walk.
Oh don't you worry that cute little noggin of yours, Adrien. You're talking to a fur-ocious feral kitty that's ready to pounce at any minute.
Oh don't you worry that cute head of yours, Adrien. The only leashes this kitten wears is the fun kind.
Normally I take care of my own grooming but I wouldn't mind handing the responsibility to a tomcat like yourself, Noir.
I usually handle my own grooming, but having a fine tomcat like yourself taking care of it sounds like a fun time, Noir.
Look all you want, blondie. I know its a rare sight for some.
Oh? Interested in taking a nice long look? Why not come a bit closer, Adrien? I promise I won't grab you by the back of the head.
Keep the puns up and you'll be getting more than just the view tonight, Adrien.
Nah I feel ya there, Noelle. I don't like to travel too far from Little Insmouth myself either. Gotta protect Minette as much as I can.
I mean, if you're really that into it, I wouldn't object to pawning them off for some easy money.
What? Trust me, this stuff is important! What're ya gonna do? Arrest me?
See! This kitty is even kind enough to give you a sneak peak of what's in store later tonight!
Taadaa! Well? Best you've ever seen, no? Awww, what's wrong? You seem at a loss for words. This shirt does pretty good at packing them in tight.
Aaand I now have no more panties for the night. Wait, I still have to go home after this... Whoops.
I mean c'mon, just cause I'm a chick, doesn't mean I'm some all mighty skullgirl that's gonna kill ya on the spot. Damn sexist assholes.
Those bastards in the Medici family still haven't seen the last of this feral though. Taking them down will be my final heist.
Now I'm able to pop off limbs as I please with no repercussions. Makes life pretty easy to be honest.
Literally.
This shouldn't be playing (=^･ω･^=)
Basil, was it? I feel like I've heard your name before... Are you a chef by any chance?
Basil... Basil... Bay-Sole. Why do I know that name? Are you a chef by any chance?
So you're a fighter of sorts... but you get all worked up over your looks as well. Even I know those two things don't go together and I'm not the sharpest crayon in the shed.
Tall, buff, stubbly beard, gruff personality. All you would need is some fish like features and I'd be in tears thinking The Fishbone Gang was somehow alive.
Mrow. Talk about leaving little to the imagination. I'm surprised I haven't seen some pictures of you on felineslookingfurlove.com.
Mrow. Quite the tight suit you've got there, Adrien. Little room for imagination there. I wonder if I've ever seen you on felineslookingfurlove.com.
Does a cat love to sit in empty boxes, Noir? Of course I am. Now take it off all sensual like.
Does a superhero beat the super villain? Of course I'm ready. Now take it off all slow like.
So, Adrien, whats with the whole cat persona then? Trying to get away with some easy cat calls?
So what is the reasoning behind the whole cat persona, Adrien? Trying to get some easy cat calls?
Hey, Plagg, was it? Are you always following Adrien? If so, you should give me a hint to what hes like down there. Shaved? Uncut? Big?
Plagg, right? You're always following Adrien so give me some hints. What's Adrien's kinks? Any thing really out there?
Oh! Oh! Do something wacky and funny when you strip! Please? Pretty please?

state.text: I feel like you messed up somehow. I mean, losing to me is quite the accomplishment.

case.state: I bet you're feline pretty stupid right now.
Hey wait a minute! You cheated, didn't you?! You just aren't good at cheating, though.
Hey now, Don't think you can get me this naked and not have repercussions!
Impress me enough and maybe I'll give ya a hand to play with.
This kitty's got claws, so don't go disappointing me now.
You better give this kitty a nice treat for the show you're getting.
Make this kitty want to go feral!
You better not just tease me with something small! Actually, that might work too.
Stop hiding the good stuff now and show off!
Hey! Do something cool and I may just roll my head over there for you.
Look! Look! He's stripping! I would'a never guessed!
Better try and do something to blow my mind big boy.
Don't lose your head over this now.
If you'd like I could give you a hand. I dunno what you'd do with it though.
Don't worry too much big guy! We all lose sometimes. Just you do a lot more it seems!
So, Reimu. You're a... Shrine Maiden? Don't think we've got those around home. What exactly is a Shrine Maiden?
You mentioned being being a Shrine Maiden right? Don't think we have any of those in Little Insmouth. What the hell is it?

state.text: Gotta say, I wouldn't expect someone looking for their loved one to come to such a raunchy place. I mean, I see this place as more of a one night stand kinda deal.
So you came to a place with a bunch of horny people to try and find your one true love? I gotta know the reasoning.

case.state: Screw it, I'm not beating around the bush tonight. Zoe! You have to have people coming to you asking about all kinds of sexy stuff with your tentacle, right?
Curiosity is really getting to this cat. Do people constantly come up to you asking about sex with that tentacle arm of yours?
You've mentioned college quite a few times now. College... Good times... Never went to college but I joined a lot of the parties there! Are you a partier?
Nami! Your outfit has me purring over here. It reminds me so much of home, but in a sexy Halloween costume kind of way.
Woah! Cat like, white hair, tan skin... Are you my long lost whisker sister?
Awww, c'mon don't get too down on yourself. Will it make you feel better if I give you a round of a-paws?
Sorry, ~target~, but you just can't beat purr-fection.
Hey now! Don't get too down on yourself. You could be about to strip in front of a bunch of random pe--- Wait a minute.
The trick is to wear somewhat skimpy clothing normally. Then you'll never be nervous about stripping!
Hey, If you catch my attention this round I'll let you borrow any limb you want for a while.
Just show us the goods already, ~name~! Please?

state.text: Just think, if you strip enough you'll... I can't think of anything not perverted right now...

case.state: C'mon now! Give this kitty a reason to go in heat.
Listen, ~target~, I'm surrounded by a bunch of aggressive lesbians back in my hometown, so don't think my eyes will leave your body.
Don't bore me half to death now. You don't want this kitty to die before you get her special show.
C'mooon! Make me want to come over there.
Won't you give this cute lil' kitty a helping hand real quick, ~target~?
This kitty is watching with prying eyes.
If you impress me I'll let you use my hand whenever you eventually lose! If you REALLY impress me then maybe I'll share my head.
Let's see if you can really blow my mind.
I guess if you strip something I’m not interested in, I can just turn my head around.
WOAH! Who is that?! Why do you have a strange sun dude covering your crotch?!
Oh! Hey, have any of you guys ever played go fish? It's a lot like poker, except it's nothing like poker!

state.text: Welp! You know what they say... I never said I knew. I just figured you did.

case.state: That clothing is looking awfully heavy. Why not just drop it all?
Hey! Hey, ~target~! I'm distracting you so you accidentally strip everything! Is it working?!
Aren't you feeling like laying it all bare for this purr-fect feline?
Why not try and make this feline go feral for you?
You wear too much! Cheater!
You've Got To Ask Yourself One Question, ~target~. ' Do I Feel Lucky? ' Well, Do Ya, Punk?
Tonight's game is a good example of claws and effect! Losing the round is clawsing ~target~ to strip down in front of some strangers!
Don't make this kitty pounce early now.
I'm here with my titties out so don't think I won't guilt trip you if you don't match me.
The anticipation is tearing my at the seams!
Will this kitty get her main dish, or just an appetizer tonight?
Let's make this kitty purr.
I'm about to roll over there and help speed things up shortly.
I guess I can't really do much but enjoy the show at this point huh?
Man, I really didn't think about how high up I have to look now...
At least this give's me a slight moment to calm down from tonight's climax.
Ah, It's just your ~clothing~.
Nyyaaww. Tell me when it gets interesting. I'mma take a cat nap.
Imagine wearing all that clothing! Couldn't be me.
I guess we gotta start somewhere.
Let's continue to get to the good stuff!
You shoulda stripped something cool! Like your arm or something. What do you mean you can't do that?
Don't mind me, just imagining you nude now, ~target~.
Want me to shove my foot up your ass? I can literally do it. I know some people are into it.
